about_the_game:
The name of MO: Astray 's original soundtrack will have the same name as the game, MO: Astray. It includes 31 songs from the game and was created by Rayark's music team SIHanatsuka, whose music design for the game was based around the themes and appearance of the various levels. It also describes the story from beginning to end, as well as the relationship between MO and that mysterious voice in his head. French singer L Lockser was also invited to interpret the theme song Epilogue, as well as including an instrumental version of Epilogue and the version of Epilogue from the trailer.

■ MO

pc_requirements.minimum:

csrr.descriptors:
輔12
本遊戲內容涉及暴力(有打鬥、攻擊等未達血腥之畫面或有輕微恐怖之畫面)。
請依個人興趣、能力進行體驗。請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。

short_description: The name of MO: Astray's original soundtrack will have the same name as the game, MO: Astray. It includes 31 songs based around the themes and appearance of the various levels in the game. It also describes the story from beginning to end, as well as the relationship between MO and that mysterious voice in his head.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
